description: This version of the  Raising Hands emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on suppo
apple_vendor_description: The raising hands emoji on Apple devices showcases a person with a medium-light skin tone, their arms extended upwards in a gesture of joyous celebration or enthusiastic agreement, brought to life with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges. The smooth gradients and realistic lighting imbue the figure with a sense of vibrant energy and positivity. This emoji is frequently used on Apple devices to express excitement, praise, or to signify a resounding 'yes!'
